mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, nickname,password, email,profile_img, updated_at, created_at) VALUES(#{username}, #{nickname},#{password}, #{email}, #{profileImg}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{passwordUpdate}, email = #{email}, profile_img = #{profileImg} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE username=#{username} AND password = #{password}
